name: Project Ragtag
summary:
Project Ragtag was the development title of the Star Wars project by Visceral Games that had started development in 2013.

Project Ragtag was a story-based, linear adventure game written by former Naughty Dog creative director Amy Hennig. But, after testing the game concept with players and listening to feedback, EA says it needs to pivot the design.

Electronic Arts announced that it is refocusing the project that was in development at Visceral Games, with EA Vancouver taking over with the new direction, assisted by other EA studios. As Visceral Games has been shutdown.
